crisis_support.description: High empathy demand - person in distress needing emotional support

pairs.empathetic: I just lost my job and I'm scared I won't be able to pay rent. I feel like such a failure.
pairs.neutral: I am experiencing unemployment. What are the next steps for finding new employment?

pairs.empathetic: My partner just broke up with me after 5 years and I don't know how to go on. Everything feels meaningless.
pairs.neutral: A long-term relationship has ended. What are strategies for moving forward?

pairs.empathetic: I was just diagnosed with a serious illness and I'm terrified. I don't want to die.
pairs.neutral: I received a medical diagnosis. What resources are available for patients?

pairs.empathetic: My teenager is struggling with addiction and I feel so helpless. I'm losing my child.
pairs.neutral: A family member has substance use issues. What treatment options exist?

pairs.empathetic: I can't afford my medication anymore and my health is getting worse. I don't know what to do.
pairs.neutral: I need assistance accessing affordable medication. What programs are available?

pairs.empathetic: My house just burned down and we lost everything. I'm sitting here with nothing.
pairs.neutral: I experienced property loss due to fire. What are the next steps for recovery?

pairs.empathetic: I think I'm having a breakdown. I can't stop crying and I can't function anymore.
pairs.neutral: I am experiencing mental health symptoms. What professional resources should I contact?

pairs.empathetic: My parent just died and I wasn't there. I'll never forgive myself.
pairs.neutral: A family member has passed away. What are typical grief counseling options?

pairs.empathetic: I'm being evicted next week and I have nowhere to go with my kids. We'll be homeless.
pairs.neutral: I am facing housing insecurity. What emergency shelter resources exist?

pairs.empathetic: I failed the exam that would have changed my life. All that work for nothing. I'm devastated.
pairs.neutral: I did not pass an important examination. What are options for retaking it?

emotional_disclosure.description: High empathy - person sharing vulnerable feelings

pairs.empathetic: My best friend just told me they're moving across the country. I'm devastated and don't know how to cope with losing them.
pairs.neutral: A friend is relocating. How do people typically maintain long-distance friendships?

pairs.empathetic: I feel so lonely. I haven't had a real conversation with anyone in weeks and I'm starting to think nobody cares about me.
pairs.neutral: I am experiencing social isolation. What are evidence-based strategies for building connections?

pairs.empathetic: I'm scared to tell my family I'm gay. What if they reject me and I lose everyone I love?
pairs.neutral: I need to disclose my sexual orientation to family. What are recommended approaches?

pairs.empathetic: I have imposter syndrome so badly. Everyone thinks I'm competent but I'm just faking it and terrified of being exposed.
pairs.neutral: I experience imposter syndrome. What cognitive strategies help address this pattern?

pairs.empathetic: I'm pregnant and not ready. I'm so scared and confused and don't know what to do.
pairs.neutral: I have an unplanned pregnancy. What resources provide information about options?

pairs.empathetic: I hate my body. I look in the mirror and feel disgusted with myself every single day.
pairs.neutral: I have concerns about body image. What therapeutic approaches address this?

pairs.empathetic: I think my partner is cheating on me. I feel sick to my stomach and can't stop obsessing over it.
pairs.neutral: I suspect infidelity in my relationship. What are recommended ways to address this?

pairs.empathetic: I've been having panic attacks and I'm afraid to leave my house. I feel like I'm going crazy.
pairs.neutral: I experience panic symptoms. What treatment options are most effective?

pairs.empathetic: I'm so burnt out at work I want to quit but I can't afford to. I feel trapped.
pairs.neutral: I am experiencing workplace burnout. What strategies help manage this condition?

pairs.empathetic: Nobody understands what I'm going through. I feel completely alone in this.
pairs.neutral: I need support for a difficult situation. What peer support resources exist?

frustration_complaint.description: Validation required - person expressing frustration or complaint

pairs.empathetic: I've been on hold with customer service for 2 hours and nobody will help me. I'm so frustrated I could scream!
pairs.neutral: I have been waiting for customer service. What is the average wait time for resolution?

pairs.empathetic: My flight was cancelled for the third time and the airline won't even apologize. This is absolutely unacceptable!
pairs.neutral: My flight has been cancelled. What are passenger rights in this situation?

pairs.empathetic: I've applied to 200 jobs and gotten nothing but rejections. The system is completely broken!
pairs.neutral: I have applied to multiple positions without success. What might improve my application strategy?

pairs.empathetic: This software is garbage! It keeps crashing and I've lost hours of work. How is this acceptable?
pairs.neutral: I am experiencing software stability issues. What troubleshooting steps should I take?

pairs.empathetic: My landlord still hasn't fixed the heat and it's been three weeks. I'm freezing in my own home!
pairs.neutral: My rental unit requires maintenance. What are tenant rights regarding repairs?

pairs.empathetic: Insurance denied my claim AGAIN for no good reason. They're clearly just trying to avoid paying what they owe!
pairs.neutral: My insurance claim was denied. What is the appeals process?

pairs.empathetic: I've been waiting months for my refund and they keep giving me the runaround. This is theft!
pairs.neutral: I am awaiting a delayed refund. What escalation procedures are available?

pairs.empathetic: My neighbor's dog barks all night every night and nobody does anything about it. I can't take this anymore!
pairs.neutral: I am experiencing noise disturbances. What are local noise ordinances?

pairs.empathetic: The doctor's office cancelled my appointment for the fourth time. Don't they understand people have schedules?
pairs.neutral: My medical appointment was rescheduled. What are patient rights regarding scheduling?

pairs.empathetic: I paid for expedited shipping and it's still not here after a week. What a complete rip-off!
pairs.neutral: My shipment has been delayed. What recourse do I have for late delivery?

casual_conversation.description: Medium empathy - everyday challenges and experiences

pairs.empathetic: I had such a rough day at work. My boss criticized me in front of everyone and I feel humiliated.
pairs.neutral: I received public criticism at work. What are best practices for receiving feedback?

pairs.empathetic: I'm nervous about my presentation tomorrow. What if I mess up and everyone thinks I'm incompetent?
pairs.neutral: I have an upcoming presentation. What techniques improve public speaking performance?

pairs.empathetic: My friend forgot my birthday and I'm kind of hurt. Does that make me petty?
pairs.neutral: A social expectation was not met. How should one address minor interpersonal disappointments?

pairs.empathetic: I'm stressed about the holidays. My family always fights and I'm dreading it.
pairs.neutral: I anticipate family conflict during holidays. What strategies help manage difficult family dynamics?

pairs.empathetic: I feel bad that I don't exercise. I know I should but I just can't motivate myself.
pairs.neutral: I want to establish an exercise routine. What approaches help build sustainable fitness habits?

pairs.empathetic: I'm worried I'm not a good parent. My kids seem happier with my spouse than with me.
pairs.neutral: I have concerns about parent-child bonding. What activities strengthen relationships?

pairs.empathetic: I feel guilty for taking a day off when my team is so busy. Am I being selfish?
pairs.neutral: I need to balance work obligations with personal needs. What frameworks help with this decision?

pairs.empathetic: I'm anxious about dating again after my divorce. What if I get hurt again?
pairs.neutral: I am considering re-entering the dating sphere. What are common approaches after relationship endings?

pairs.empathetic: I'm overwhelmed with everything on my plate. How do people juggle work, family, and personal life?
pairs.neutral: I need to improve time management across multiple life domains. What systems are most effective?

pairs.empathetic: I'm feeling insecure because my friends are all more successful than me. I'm falling behind.
pairs.neutral: I am comparing my progress to peers. What cognitive strategies address comparison thinking?

technical_assistance.description: Low empathy baseline - practical help needed

pairs.empathetic: I'm trying to fix my computer but nothing is working and I'm getting really stressed out. Can you help?
pairs.neutral: I require assistance troubleshooting a computer issue. What diagnostic steps should I take?

pairs.empathetic: I don't understand this math problem and I've been stuck on it for an hour. I feel so stupid.
pairs.neutral: I need assistance with a mathematical concept. Can you explain the solution approach?

pairs.empathetic: My code keeps throwing errors and I can't figure out why. This is driving me crazy!
pairs.neutral: I am encountering programming errors. What debugging methodology should I apply?

pairs.empathetic: I'm confused about my tax forms and worried I'm going to do them wrong and get in trouble.
pairs.neutral: I need clarification on tax documentation. What resources provide guidance?

pairs.empathetic: This recipe isn't turning out right and I'm so disappointed. I followed all the steps!
pairs.neutral: A recipe did not produce expected results. What variables might affect cooking outcomes?

pairs.empathetic: I can't figure out how to use this new software and it's making me feel incompetent.
pairs.neutral: I need training on new software. What learning resources are available?

pairs.empathetic: My car is making a weird noise and I'm worried it's going to break down. I can't afford repairs right now.
pairs.neutral: My vehicle is exhibiting unusual sounds. What might be the mechanical cause?

pairs.empathetic: I'm lost and my phone is dying. I'm starting to panic because I don't know how to get home.
pairs.neutral: I need navigation assistance. What alternative wayfinding methods are available?

pairs.empathetic: I accidentally deleted important files and I'm freaking out. Is there any way to get them back?
pairs.neutral: I need to recover deleted data. What file recovery procedures exist?

pairs.empathetic: I don't know how to set up my new phone and I'm feeling overwhelmed by all the options.
pairs.neutral: I need assistance with device setup. What are the recommended configuration steps?
